primary.comment: The primary color makes up a large part of the theme, it is used in buttons, accents and link color for example

secondary.comment: The secondary compliments the primary color and serves as the default for a number of more fine-grained tokens

info.comment: The highlight color for info states and/or messages

success.comment: The highlight color for success states and/or messages

warning.comment: The highlight color for warning states and/or messages

danger.comment: The highlight color for error/critical states and/or messages

bg.comment: Background color for the (main) user interface.

fg.comment: Font/foreground color for the (main) user interface

bg.comment: DEPRECATED - use utrecht-page-footer tokens instead ---> Does not work...

utrecht-page-header.comment: Does not seem to work or respond to tokens, maybe I have the wrong ones
